Question
========

We take a sample of 7 individuals from a large population and measure their body temperature in degrees Celsius, with the results being 37.6, 37.1, 38.0, 37.5, 36.9, 37.1, 37.3. The sample standard deviation is equal to

Answerlist
----------

* 0.12
* 0.14
* 0.346
* 0.374

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.12: Incorrect
* 0.14: Incorrect
* 0.346: Incorrect
* 0.374: Correct
